title: React native Storybook configuration
description: Set up Storybook for a React-Native app or library.

name.description: Project for which to generate Storybook configuration.
name.x-prompt: For which project do you want to generate Storybook configuration?

generateStories.description: Automatically generate *.stories.ts files for components declared in this project?
generateStories.x-prompt: Automatically generate *.stories.ts files for components declared in this project?

js.description: Generate JavaScript story files rather than TypeScript story files.

tsConfiguration.description: Configure your project with TypeScript. Generate main.ts and preview.ts files, instead of main.js and preview.js.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into `<projectRoot>/project.json` rather than including it inside `workspace.json`.

ignorePaths.description: Paths to ignore when looking for components, comma-separated. Paths must start with {projectRoot} or {workspaceRoot}.
